taskSettings.info: Modules are the place where all the interaction happens. You can choose from 5 different types of modules.
taskSettings.title: Title
taskSettings.question: Question
taskSettings.questionExample: e.g. What should be the name of our new app?
taskSettings.descriptionExample: e.g. The purpose of the meeting is to come up with new ideas our new app.

sessionSettings.info: The session is the place that bundles all information belonging to your brainstorming adventure.
sessionSettings.title: Title
sessionSettings.descriptionExample: e.g. The purpose of the meeting is to come up with new ideas our new app.
sessionSettings.topicsInfo: Topics help to make a clear distinction between subjects that should have separate brainstorming modules. Tip: Keep it simple - one or two topics are usually enough!

processTimeline.activatePublicScreen: display this content on the public screen
processTimeline.changePublicScreen: display this item on the public screen
processTimeline.activateParticipant: activate this item for the participants
processTimeline.changeOrder: change the order of the items

taskTimeline.activatePublicScreen: display this topic on the public screen
taskTimeline.changePublicScreen: display this task on the public screen
taskTimeline.activateParticipant: activate this task for the participants
taskTimeline.changeOrder: change the order of the tasks

login.info: Go ahead and login to access all your existing resources create new brainstorming sessions.

register.info: Go ahead and create an account if you want to use our great brainstorming tool.
Please enter your personal info to create an account.

login.info:
If you already have an account, just go ahead and login to access all
 your existing resources.

register.prototypeKeyInfo: This is a prototype. You need the prototype key to test the application in this state.

resetPassword.info: If you have forgotten your password, enter your email here and we will send you a link to reset your password.

join.info: Just enter the code your moderator provided and you’re ready to go!
join.browserKeyInfo: Your last individual connections have been saved. You can rejoin past sessions if the sessions are still open for participation by selecting them from the list. If you want to join a new session, please enter the new session PIN.

home.info: Spacehuddle takes a new approach to brainstorming with multiple people. For creating new brainstorming sessions, use the Moderator tool. You can then join an existing brainstorming session via the session code.

notFound.info: Sorry, this page does either not exist, or you are not authorized to access it.
